about_the_game:
The continuation of the End War RTS, the use of pure new real-time placement units, the attack of important strategic points, the game playing method of competing for economic advantages, and the new playing method not available in the previous series of games such as End War RTS



King War [RTS] map system can automatically generate a new map by setting the size and water area size



The King War [RTS] world is composed of eight camps of the United States, France, Britain, Germany, Russia, Cuba, Libya and aliens. The power and weapon units of each country are different. The American aerospace aircraft carrier, the Russian missile submarine and other features



King War [RTS] There are a large number of weapon units in the world. With the rich land, sea and air play, expanding your army needs to obtain more minerals. Crazy occupation of more resources is your primary strategic goal. Build more mines, more mining cars, use metal storms, lightning towers and other defense structures to hold your position, ground power lightning tanks, long-range strike missiles, air power aircraft carriers God's particle ND500 warships are your powerful force



King War [RTS] inherits the characteristics of End War RTS. The advanced alien race can be developed in a rolling way. It is the strongest race in the King War [RTS] world, and the time resurrection technology is the killer of the alien race
detailed_description:
The continuation of the End War RTS, the use of pure new real-time placement units, the attack of important strategic points, the game playing method of competing for economic advantages, and the new playing method not available in the previous series of games such as End War RTS



King War [RTS] map system can automatically generate a new map by setting the size and water area size



The King War [RTS] world is composed of eight camps of the United States, France, Britain, Germany, Russia, Cuba, Libya and aliens. The power and weapon units of each country are different. The American aerospace aircraft carrier, the Russian missile submarine and other features



King War [RTS] There are a large number of weapon units in the world. With the rich land, sea and air play, expanding your army needs to obtain more minerals. Crazy occupation of more resources is your primary strategic goal. Build more mines, more mining cars, use metal storms, lightning towers and other defense structures to hold your position, ground power lightning tanks, long-range strike missiles, air power aircraft carriers God's particle ND500 warships are your powerful force



King War [RTS] inherits the characteristics of End War RTS. The advanced alien race can be developed in a rolling way. It is the strongest race in the King War [RTS] world, and the time resurrection technology is the killer of the alien race
name: King War [RTS]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7,Win10
  • Processor: I3 3.20GHZ
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Support Dx11 graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: support openAL
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7,Win10
  • Processor: I7 8 Core 3.20GHZ
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: support openAL

short_description: Who can be the last king in the dogfight between the countries of the earth and aliens? A pixel-style real-time strategy game, a simple and easy experience for placing units
